articles.description: England face Scotland in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium, Sharjah – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs Scotland LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: England fight back in the second half to overcome an impressive Canada in Vancouver and retain their WXV1 title.
articles.title: Canada 12-21 England: Red Roses retain WXV title

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes looks set to be fit for a second Test against Pakistan that seems likely to be played on the same Multan pitch as the record-breaking first Test.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes set to be fit, same Multan pitch in line to be used

articles.description: Artur Beterbiev beat Dmitry Bivol by majority decision to become undisputed light-heavyweight world champion in a high-quality contest in Saudi.
articles.title: Artur Beterbiev outpoints Dmitry Bivol, Fabio Wardley knocks out Frazer Clarke

articles.description: Teenage winger Ben Doak earns praise from head coach Steve Clarke and pundits after his first Scotland start in the loss to Croatia.
articles.title: 'Standout' Doak lights up Scotland gloom amid defeat in Croatia

articles.description: Follow live text and 5 Live commentary as England travel to face Finland in the Nations League.
articles.title: England vs Finland: Lee Carsley wants reaction from Three Lions after Nations League Greece defeat

articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino wins his first match in charge of the United States as they beat Panama 2-0 in a friendly.
articles.title: United States 2-0 Panama: Mauricio Pochettino wins first match in charge

articles.description: As Wimbledon scraps human line judges, sport insiders suggest how we can make games more exciting.
articles.title: From Wimbledon to VAR, is tech making sport less dramatic?

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores his 133rd Portugal goal as they beat Poland in the Nations League.
articles.title: Poland 1-3 Portugal: Cristiano Ronaldo scores as 133rd international goal in Nations League victory

articles.description: James Anderson says he has the “urge” to keep playing but is undecided on how he will extend his career.
articles.title: James Anderson has 'urge' to extend playing career
